title: How to Play
tip: Turns in Sushi Go! Online happen simultaneously.
Each player chooses one card from their hand to play that turn. The remaining cards are then passed counter clockwise to the next player.
Players continue to pass cards around and pick a card from each hand until all cards are gone.

title: How to Score
tip: Players score points by playing cards.
Card totals are tallied at the end of the game.
All players are awarded points (or might even lose 'em) depending on the values of each card, and the number of cards played of each type.

title: How to Win
tip: Playing by stomach alone won't ensure a win! Winning is all about strategy.
To secure your best chance of winning, players should consider some of the following...:
• how many cards of each type are left in the other hands?
